Description:
1912. The United States has made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹world domination, and the floating city of Columbia, opened with great fanfare by the jubilation enthusiastic audience, has become a majestic symbol of American ideals. However, a promising venture soon turned into a disaster: for an unknown reason, the city suddenly disappeared in the sky-high given. America's greatest achievement has disappeared without a trace ...

In this story full of mysteries starring role given to the former detective agency Pinkerton Booker DeWitt. He was sent to Colombia to track down and release some Elizabeth, for which the city of the future was flying a prison in childhood. Detective to mend the relationship with the girl, to the full extent of its use and its unusual ability - because out of Columbia, which is losing altitude every second (and therefore its collapse - only a matter of time), they will turn out just the two.

Supplement "Clash in the Clouds "is focused on the combat component of BioShock Infinite. Combine weapons, energy, gears, breaks and aerotrassy most unimaginable ways and get out of the most difficult situations. You will test 60 4 brand new maps. Take the test "Blue Ribbon" and open sketches golosofony, kinetoscopes etc. at Columbia Archaeological Society.

Features:
" Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of the world in bright distinctive style of American industrialism, as embodied by the Unreal Engine 3. 
" puzzle-solving, the disclosure of sinister secrets and fighting for his life in a dizzying battles in the clouds - stay in Colombia did not name any boring or monotonous 
" Use by your own set of weapons and abilities very non-trivial characters. 
" In a hostile world of the celestial Elizabeth will become your faithful companion. And let the game run its actions, it is necessary for you to become a real, live person. 
" Love the ordeal? So, it is addressed to you when high realism - "1999". Accept the challenge to developers - and you have to carefully weigh the "pros" and "cons" before making any decision. How should think over the line of the hero - remember that the possibility of his resurrection is limited, and any misstep could lead to a sudden end the game.

Information about the release:
" Steam Application ID: 8870

" No need for third-party installers and updates. Game content is packaged in a simple installer with little compression. 

Installation

Typical installation:
1. Install the game by running Setup.exe
2. Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder with a game 
3. In the folder LangSelector run the reg-file according to your preferred language. At the request of the changes to the registry - agree. 
4. Play. 
Installing client Steam (only for holders of a license key): 
Warning! Before installing a client Steam, the game should already be registered to your account, and the client Steam - closed.
Automatic installation: 
1. Run the file SteamInstallHelper.exe and follow the instructions. 
2. Play 
Manual: 
1. Run Setup.exe 
2. Install the game client Steam (* folder with the client Steam *  steamapps  common  BioShock Infinite)
Code:
ie way to install the game should look like this: C:  Program Files  Steam  steamapps  common  BioShock Infinite
3. Copy the entire contents of the "Depot" in the root folder of the Steam client 
4. Play.
